text: tavada mema polove ovun kalahakam kirimatat, oba ha obage devivarun atahæra dæmimatat musa ha musage pirisa va oba ata hæra damannehi dæyi firavunge pirisagen vu pradhanihu pavasa sitiyaha. (evita) ovunge pirimi daruvan ghatanaya karamu. ovunge gæhænu daruvan panapitin ata hæra damamu. tavada sæbævinma api ovunata ihalin balaya yodavannan vemu yæyi ohu pævasiya
